alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Union (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Sioux Falls (Southeastern SD, Southwestern MN, and Northwestern IA)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 7:17PM MDT until May 12 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Sioux Falls
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sioux Falls has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Sioux County in northwestern Iowa... Northwestern Plymouth County in northwestern Iowa... Southeastern Lincoln County in southeastern South Dakota... Northeastern Union County in southeastern South Dakota... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 817 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Akron, or 8 miles south of Hawarden, moving north at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Hawarden, Alcester and Ireton around 830 PM CDT. Hudson around 845 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Chatsworth. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for northwestern Iowa...and southeastern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
